author:
Tim Reynolds                                                    
                            AP
title: For NBA coaches, the new schedule involves waiting, wondering and planning
description: NBA coaches are all spending more time at home, not able to run practices, but none seem to be sitting idly, either.
content:
MIAMI Orlandos Steve Clifford figures hes like every other NBA coach right now: Wake up, go to whatever now serves as the office, study his own team, maybe think about possible opponents and resume planning.
Of course, nobody knows what theyre planning for o… [+3694 chars]
